title: Are Expensive Gaming Laptops Actually Worth It?
description: I compare a budget gaming laptop to something a bit more expensive.   ASUS Canada kindly sent the new ROG Zephyrus G14:  The HP Victus Laptop (Amazon Affiliate):   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Akamai (previously Linode)! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
